POWERED by FUSION

An individual post follows.

Listen to More Rachel’s

Rachel’s are presently owning my little speakers. There’s not a damn thing they can’t do: lush chamber music, textured electronic dirges, beautiful lyrical pieces, you name it. Listen to Selenography (RIAA safe!) and you’ll feel like you’re rocketing back and forth between 2004 and 1924. It’s a good feeling.

—Jun 17, 2003
